document_title: Gastric (stomach) bleeding: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: xuat-huyet-da-day.json_3_Who is susceptible to stomach bleeding?
subsection_content: Stomach bleeding is a medical condition that commonly occurs between the ages of 20 and 50, in which men usually account for a higher rate than women because they tend to drink more alcohol. Older people who often use non-steroidal anti-inflammatory pain relievers or aspirin are also at high risk of gastrointestinal bleeding.
subsection_title: xuat huyet da day.json. Who is susceptible to stomach bleeding?
subsection_data:
xuat huyet da day.json. Who is susceptible to stomach bleeding?
Stomach bleeding is a medical condition that commonly occurs between the ages of 20 and 50, in which men usually account for a higher rate than women because they tend to drink more alcohol. Older people who often use non-steroidal anti-inflammatory pain relievers or aspirin are also at high risk of gastrointestinal bleeding.
